content: I sometimes run into the problem, that a particular subgoal requires earlier proven subgoals. I always use next in between subgoals, but this prevents re-using the fact. Is there a common solution? I could imagine: drop next and use the fact (which I haven't seen in any other code, I think) or start the overall proof using proof - state the facts using have and re-use them later.
